website_summaries.verdict: A tough, lightweight screen with plenty of coverage. Good for beginners starting out with green screen.
pros: Includes a 3-inch rod pocket to make hanging easier
Stands out for its edges, which are fully stitched to prevent fraying and prolong lifespan
cons: Some users find the material too thin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect green screen with a perfect thickness! Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I cant recommend this enough. the size is great and when properly lit its perfect! I had concerns that the shade of green would cause an issue with my xsplit and OBS software when streaming but I was able to chroma key out everything that I needed too. The fabric is quite sturdy with multiple means of mounting including holes for railing. If you have a doubt about this then you shouldn't because the price and performace of this material is something to be astounded by!
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my production
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my home studio. Plenty big enough for my production. Needed to wash it and dry on low. Then used Downey wrinkle release spray. Pull tight nailing to wall and works great. Use FCPX and key it right out easy.. price is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amy and Billy

customer_reviews.title: Yes, I live my life on Zoom (or Skype, or Hangouts) these days.
customer_reviews.text: I admit it: if I'm going to spend all my time in Zoom conferences, I want a decent virtual backdrop. Static or animated, just as long as it isn't the same dull wall. And the only way to do this reliably is with a green screen backdrop. So this is it. It works. What else is there to say?
customer_reviews.author: Geoff Arnold

customer_reviews.title: A Bit Thinner Than I Would Have Liked...
customer_reviews.text: This muslin backdrop is certainly a great value for the cost! I would have like it to be a little bit thicker / heavier, because ambient background light can show through, so I have to put some material behind it and increase my lighting just a bit to offset. But it is an outstanding product that I am happy I bought, because it has certainly helped improve the quality of my videos.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolas J.

customer_reviews.title: It's a green cotton sheet. But it works.
customer_reviews.text: I guess I was expecting a thicker fabric. This is like a kelly green cotton sheet. It does work fine once you get it hung, but it did require ironing which was a chore because of its size. For it to work well, you need to invest in good separate lighting for the green screen in addition to the lighting on you. It also needs to be wrinkle free and be stretched taunt which is why you will need those clamps. Overall, it does what it said it would do. I don't consider it professional quality, but great for amateurs like myself.
customer_reviews.author: C Bell

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for streaming gaming sessions on twitch and Youtube ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for streaming gaming sessions on twitch and Youtube Gaming. The green screen works perfectly to mask out the surrounding area and only show the subject as an overlay on the gaming screen.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mefford

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems OK, but you will need to iron it before using it, the fabric seems a little stiff and the wrinkles will produce shadows if the illumination is not correct. I used to replace backdrop, it worked fine. But if you don't want to deal with wrinkles or have something that will block better the backlighting, I would recommend to expend the extra money and get the real muslin fabric sheets. This one works fine for the quick shot that I had.
customer_reviews.author: Fco_cali

customer_reviews.title: Takes some light adjustments but works as it should
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough but you will have to steam it as there will be some wrinkles from being folded up. Can't complain at all for the price but keep in mind that using a green screen requires more than just purchasing this with some clamps and a bar to hang it from. Lighting must be perfect if you want a good effect so plan on getting some sort of three source lighting kit to make this work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkles if you move it
customer_reviews.text: Very thin. I have it against a wall so no light shines behind it, but I'll need more light to get by the wrinkling issues. I ironed it and by the time I put it up, there were wrinkles. Took it down and put it back up, lots more wrinkles. Since I need something portable I may have to do something else.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M

customer_reviews.title: it works great. As always
customer_reviews.text: It works well IF you don't let any light in behind it. Muslin is thin enough that any light behind shines through and washes out the color. But, if you place it against a wall or a dark space, it works great. As always, don't stand too close or the green will reflect onto you and make "fringes"!
customer_reviews.author: JimH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast, efficient service. Product more than meet expectations. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great, cheap greenscreen for streaming!
customer_reviews.text: This greenscreen works great. I primarily use it for keying out my background while streaming on TwitchTV. You may have to play around with your OBS settings a bit to get it to key out properly, and you will have to light it properly. The way I've set mine up is with a regular table lamp on either side and it works perfectly for my purposes. I feel like it gives my stream a very professional feel and edge.
customer_reviews.author: TheBulla

customer_reviews.title: Great product if hung on a wall or over a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product if hung on a wall or over a solid color surface. The fabric is a bit too thin when used with a backdrop holder. If there’s strong light behind, it’ll bleed through the fabric and not let the chromakey work so well
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Very exactly 100% what I wanted and expected
customer_reviews.text: Works well. If you light your backdrop correctly you won't have the problems some people are having. People on here are complaining that it is thin, but the real problem is that these people are cheap and stupid. If you want a thick green screen that you will put in front of a window (Why are you doing that anyway?) Then you need to spend the money to get one. This was very inexpensive and I was able to key very easily. The loop on the end makes it easy to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew T. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good for its price
customer_reviews.text: The screen is green but the problem is that its see through so thats a 3/5 stars. However, a simple fix is by placing a thicker backdrop behind it preferably black and that will help the transperency issue. So for the low price in mind and quick solution it goes from 3/5 stars to 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Average quality
customer_reviews.text: Its a regular sheet, the material is kinda heavy not really thick, it does rip easily and it does wrinkle but shipping was pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREEN SCREEN WORKS AS ADVERTISED
customer_reviews.text: Although I am still working the FX bugs out of my OSTO TV on ROKU TV - this green screen is perfect for my needs. Be mindful of the size you get, you may under-estimate like me. I got the 6ft x 9 ft which is adequate but for doing wider shots like this a larger green screen would give more depth. thats it... onward thru the fRog.
customer_reviews.author: CosmicGuy

customer_reviews.title: I nailed this to my wall and it works great. If you have unevening lighting you need at ...
customer_reviews.text: I nailed this to my wall and it works great. If you have unevening lighting you need at least two lights to make a green screen work, one to light you up and one to remove the shadow from the backdrop. Great material, seems like it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: So it does the job just fine. it is big enough for full body photos
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Quality is decent. It is washable, so wrinkles can come out. It's thinner than expected, however that doesn't effect the the results in green screen programs. So it does the job just fine. it is big enough for full body photos!
customer_reviews.author: Kris M

customer_reviews.title: smells funny! Great size for personal uses
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, smells funny! Great size for personal uses, don't expect to film the next Star Wars in front of this. Literally a 6'x9' piece of bright green cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Butterfingers

customer_reviews.title: It'll work
customer_reviews.text: This will do what you want but the material is pretty thin.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Crow

customer_reviews.title: Just What I've Been Looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for us. Just know the size you need. If the person is standing in one location this will work fine; and perhaps (when turned long ways) two or more sitting would work. I only tried as shown in the picture and it is only good for one person standing with limited moving.
customer_reviews.author: TheDrMrsSmith

customer_reviews.title: Color is perfect but the fabric is very thin
customer_reviews.text: You can almost see through it. If there is any kind of light coming from behind the screen, it will mess up the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good deal
customer_reviews.text: Two drawbacks: the sheet is quite thin, and the seamwork is sloppy in spots. But still works well for a ->cheap<- green screen. Ran it through a rinse cycle and hung it up to dry and the creases came right out and the weave tightened up a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Mr JFern

customer_reviews.title: Came pretty wrinkled but not a problem at all
customer_reviews.text: Came pretty wrinkled but not a problem at all. The one thing I would say is if you have lighting behind your screen goes transparent. Very thin material. But definitely works! Received my package on time and neatly packaged thank you seller!
customer_reviews.author: Maya Wolves

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for Green Screen Project!
customer_reviews.text: Great for my purposes. Used this in my classroom for a green screen project. The videos were excellent. Only needed to steam the wrinkles out and the fabric was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: ByDesign

customer_reviews.title: Quality screen for the price
customer_reviews.text: I stream on twitch and wanted a green screen. I purchased one previously that was a weird material and I ended up buying this one. It was cloth and has an area already sewn in to put a pole through to hang it up which was a surprise and since I already had the stands made this work better then expected
customer_reviews.author: Charlie Chaos

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. Easy to handle and big enough for my purpose. Item just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Set it up correctly and get some Downy wrinkle release and it will do the job just right.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Smith

customer_reviews.title: Can wait to use!!!
customer_reviews.text: 👍 . I havent used it yet but was exactly what i wanted!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: My son was elated as he is 15 and wants to work in the movies/ making & editing films
customer_reviews.author: Amazonlove

customer_reviews.title: You can only use curtain hanger, but it's great for chroma keying!
customer_reviews.text: You can only use a curtain hanger. Try to tape it using any tape and it will fall off later. But the quality is good for chroma keying!
customer_reviews.author: Syed

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Husband to use for his gaming streams. Works so well I will be buying another for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Etrela

customer_reviews.title: Awesome buy it works using Final Cut Pro
customer_reviews.text: Awesome buy it works using Final Cut Pro. Perfect for indoor use only though, since canvas will see through placing over direct sunlight. Easily fixed, great way to get in shape!
customer_reviews.author: T. K.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but it is fairly see through if not ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality but it is fairly see through if not doubled. Its very difficult to get rid of all the wrinkles and store it without it becoming wrinkled again. If you want a backdrop that will appear consistently smooth I suggest finding something made of spandex. Much more forgiving.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beginner to Intermediate Work
customer_reviews.text: It accomplished exactly what I needed it to. It's a little on the thin side, but as long as you put it against a wall that doesn't have any windows or light from behind it, the green screen software took the background right out. Great value for beginner to intermediate work.
customer_reviews.author: WilliamAvon .com

customer_reviews.title: What more you expect from a green sheet?
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike, it really depends on your lighting and the camera you use for the screen to truly disappear under the chroma settings.
customer_reviews.author: Getahinsh TTV

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Affordale and versatile. It has a loop at the top for hanging on a rod, which is a bonus as I didn't see that info when I ordered it. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Wood

customer_reviews.title: Love the green screen
customer_reviews.text: Love the green screen. I purchased to use with kids at my teaching job and it is the perfect height/width to create some super fun projects using green screen technology.
customer_reviews.author: jag

customer_reviews.title: It’s good in a pinch but I’ll probably never use it ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely thin. Plan on ironing this before each use. It’s good in a pinch but I’ll probably never use it again
customer_reviews.author: Yoli Pink

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is a very nice quality and has a constant colour
customer_reviews.author: Rainverm38

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for Streamers that have camera up close
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for Streamers that have camera up close. Not very large so if you plan on having the screen more than 3 feet behind you... Go larger!
customer_reviews.author: MisterManbun

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected. The only problem is if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. The only problem is if you have a light source behind it (e.g. window) - it is not dense enough to cut it out. But if you place something (like a blanket) under it, it solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Jaroslaw Janiszewski

customer_reviews.title: Handy for backgrounds.
customer_reviews.text: Nice to be able to use for background during my on-line meetings.
customer_reviews.author: G. Michael Sanborn

customer_reviews.title: You will need something to hang it with for the best effect.
customer_reviews.text: It is what it is described to be and does what it says it will do. You will need something to hang it with for the best effect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... this for a school news studio and it works great. The only thing I would like is for ...
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for a school news studio and it works great. The only thing I would like is for the fabric to be just a little thicker - but it is definitely working for what we need.
customer_reviews.author: ASW

customer_reviews.title: Eh..
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like the quality of this screen. Stiff. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Tang

customer_reviews.title: it does work for Chroma on Xsplit but the material ...
customer_reviews.text: it does work for Chroma on Xsplit but the material is very thin so when you have a room that is well lit, it does not work as well.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Good Screen
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger then I had initially thought but works like a charm. The material used also allows for ease of use when in dimly lit rooms. Great green screen.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Hollywood at Home!
customer_reviews.text: Achieved desired effect for birthday party themed party pictures, Lightweight fabric
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Thin but it works
customer_reviews.text: A bit thin but if you put a sheet behind it everything is fine
customer_reviews.author: Mike B.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Jus what I was looking for, kind of wrinkled not bad
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: The green screen is a great length and not too sheer. Works perfectly for what I need!
customer_reviews.author: Nora Darling

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Used this for class projects in science. It was perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Grier

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Does the Job <3
customer_reviews.text: Love it! came perfectly well packaged and nicely folded in a plastic sticky bag that folds over. Does the job but its pretty thin like Silk so Note: You don't want to put it in the window or anything but something behind it would be maybe recommended as for mine I got nothing behind it. Thanks ePhotoInc <3
customer_reviews.author: XSTERSIA

customer_reviews.title: Works but a little thin
customer_reviews.text: A little on the thin side but works perfectly for what I need it for. I'm a teacher and use it in the classroom with the Do Ink app for projects.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gets The Job Done
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it's a green sheet. What more can you expect?
customer_reviews.author: Noah Stork

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice green screen. Works Perfect for my streaming on xbox
customer_reviews.author: Deandra

customer_reviews.title: Came pretty wrinkled from shipping but after ironing it
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Came pretty wrinkled from shipping but after ironing it, it works well for my needs
customer_reviews.author: Julian

customer_reviews.title: Great size, and value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great size, and value for the price. The material is slightly see-through, but works excellent. Does not seem it will tear too easily, and had worked great for the last several days. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Crom The Beast

customer_reviews.title: Gotta have one!
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Great use in my classroom. Kids love it!
customer_reviews.author: P. Wurkelson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginner's green screen
customer_reviews.text: This is a great buy if you need a solid green screen on a budget. I found it to be wide enough for almost anything I want to do. It does the job, and it didn't break the bank.
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: A very cheap, but sturdy green-screen sheet. Great for basic work for green screening for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Reed

customer_reviews.title: Not for streaming or green screen use
customer_reviews.text: Darker than looks in picture so hard to use with green screen
customer_reviews.author: Alex Williamson

customer_reviews.title: As expected. We used it for Green Screen photos ...
customer_reviews.text: As expected. We used it for Green Screen photos. It is a bit small for 2+ people for the purpose I mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Ami

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I expected. Performed perfectly. Yes, had folds and wrinkles, but if you have the right Chroma-Key software you don't even need to iron this stuff out (I didn't, and the software had no issues removing the background anyway). Great for a new dad who goes overboard with photos that will one day embarrass his daughter.
customer_reviews.author: motodoc817

customer_reviews.title: Working great
customer_reviews.text: My first green screen not sure how it compares to others but seems to work.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 1

customer_reviews.title: beware of seethroughness
customer_reviews.text: its good, but you can see right through it so you have to either put it on a wall or put a white towel behind it
customer_reviews.author: osvaldo

customer_reviews.title: awesome green screen
customer_reviews.text: I like this cuz I now can shoot video with more personal look to it when it calls for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very useful product
customer_reviews.text: I was for the most part very happy with my green screen purchase, my use for it was very simple so it served its purpose, I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: People were saying that it tears easy that its hard to get the wrinkles out when you first open it ect.... Well no rips on mine yes its thin but also look at the price you are paying. It works for me have no issues wrinkles came out easy have mine on a flat wall not in front of a window and bought lighting for it to help with my streaming. Any videos I record works great with this and the programs pick it up with very little adjustments
customer_reviews.author: Conrad Hines

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! It is darker than "chromakey green", but i have no issues with color at all! It is huge, good quality material!! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: jeremy

customer_reviews.title: even reflections of light) pass through it rendering the green screen effect useless. One would have to place something solid behind ...
customer_reviews.text: The item is completely see-threw, any light (windows, lights, even reflections of light) pass through it rendering the green screen effect useless. One would have to place something solid behind it in order to use it hung up. Returned this item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very thin. You can see objects behind it through the fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not thick enough a bit transparent if you have back light
customer_reviews.author: J. SAADI

customer_reviews.title: Very thin, not good as a twitch green screen
customer_reviews.text: Very thin, any light from behind the fabric came right through the cloth. Needed to use a dark bed sheet behind it to make it a usable green screen hung up on a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Waseque Qazi

customer_reviews.title: nice for someone who only needs a green screen a ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a very simple green screen, nice for someone who only needs a green screen a few times
customer_reviews.author: Richard Richter

customer_reviews.title: mehh
customer_reviews.text: Just got to say, this thing is incredibly thin. Oh and buy the metal stand Its worth every penny
customer_reviews.author: Justin Greenawalt

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is just a green sheet. I could have bought a piece of green fabric for less.
customer_reviews.author: Always need somethingTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: Like, I wanted this, looked like it would do what I wanted it to do, and guess what, it did. It's exactly as it looks online. So can't really give it anything other than 5 stars. I'm using it for a green screen, always wanted to play with those, and it was surprisingly easy to setup using OBS free software and works great. My only complaint is that it came folded up, so there were creases from the folds, but it was easy enough to get those ironed out, and can't think of anything they could have done to avoid that with it being shipped and all.
customer_reviews.author: Kissell

customer_reviews.title: Decent green screen
customer_reviews.text: This green screen is good for small projects. the material is a little see through so it works best tacked onto a wall rather than being hung on a stand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: ePhotoInc 6 x 9 Feet Cotton Chromakey Green Screen Muslin Backdrop Photo Photography Background G69
product_meta.description:
Suitable for all level photographers from amateurs to professionals. It's a perfect solution to produce photos for web retailers and commercial product catalog, especially good for portrait and costume. 

Package Includes: 
1x 6ft x 9ft Green Backdrop
feature_bullets: 3" Rod Pocket and fully Stitched Edges
Made of Top-grade Cotton and Non-pollutant Textile

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars213 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
